cu.explanation_en: Setting MCC to 999 exceeds the valid range for mobile country codes, causing PLMN configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting number of downlink slots to 15 exceeds the maximum allowed for the TDD periodicity, causing frame structure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行時隙數設定為 15 超過 TDD 週期的最大允許值，會導致幀結構失敗。
